channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shunning Friends And Family For Their Political Beliefs Is An Affront To The Spirit Of Christmas
item.description: As we celebrate Christmas, all of us, regardless of our political persuasion, should strive to live out Jesus’ words in Matthew 5:43-44.

item.title: ‘Home Alone’ Hilariously Teaches Timeless Truths About Motherhood
item.description: 'Home Alone' isn’t just a funny Christmas movie. It displays a mother’s transformation from selfish, absentee parent to devoted loving mother.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene wants death penalty for migrant who allegedly set woman on fire on subway: 'Finish him'
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene calls for a swift trial and death penalty for the suspect accused of setting a woman on fire on a New York subway.

item.title: The Most Politically Absurd Things Americans Had To Endure This Year
item.description: If this presidential election year taught us anything, it’s that there is no bottom in matters of the politically absurd.
